Install services

All services are setup using Kustomize defined in Sources folder.

Deploy

  1. Update values in
    1. Change domain in grafana-chart-values.yml
    2. Add digitalocean.com DNS token to ../tmp/dnstoken access-token=YOUR_TOKEN If you use different DNS provider change issuer.yml see docs for more informations https://cert-manager.io/docs/configuration/acme/dns01/
    3. Change loadbalancer IP in metallb and then also in ingress controller
    4. Change email in cert-manager
  2. Run manifests.sh file. In case that you will run into CRD nonexistent error run command again.

Verify
